content:
Sure! Here are a few personas that describe a range of diverse people for generating user stories for your non-dating in person social activities app:

1. Sarah: Sarah is a 26-year-old graphic designer who recently moved to a new city for her job. She is looking for ways to meet new people and expand her social network. Sarah enjoys trying new bars and restaurants and playing sports, such as soccer and basketball.
2. Dave: Dave is a 35-year-old lawyer who is married with two young children. He is looking for ways to meet new friends who are also parents and coordinate activities with their families. Dave enjoys going on hikes and playing board games with his family.
3. Alex: Alex is a 22-year-old college student who is looking for ways to meet new friends and coordinate group activities, such as going to concerts and sporting events. Alex is also interested in finding people to play pickup games of basketball and football with.
4. Jennifer: Jennifer is a 30-year-old marketing manager who is looking for ways to meet new friends and coordinate activities outside of work. Jennifer enjoys trying new fitness classes and going on runs with friends.
5. Kyle: Kyle is a 40-year-old software engineer who is looking for ways to meet new friends and coordinate activities that involve his hobbies, such as playing chess and tabletop games. Kyle also enjoys attending trivia nights and watching sports games.
